officialTitle: Analysis of Ethnic and Racial Disparities in Access to Acute Stroke Care in Italy: A Multicentric, Prospective Cohort Study

protocolDocument.label: Study Protocol and Statistical Analysis Plan

primary.measure: Racial/ethnic disparities in the access to revascularization treatments
primary.description: Comparison of the likelihood of undergoing revascularization treatments among patients from different racial and/or ethnic groups.

secondary.measure: Racial/ethnic disparities in onset to door times
secondary.description: Comparison of Onset-to-Door Time among patients from different racial and/or ethnic groups.

secondary.measure: Racial/ethnic disparities in door to needle times
secondary.description: Comparison of differences in Door-to-Needle Time (DTN) between patients from different racial and/or ethnic groups.
secondary.timeFrame: From the time of ED admission at baseline to start of intravenous thrombolysis

secondary.measure: Racial/ethnic disparities in door to groin times
secondary.description: Comparison of differences in Door-to-Groin Time (DTG) between patients from different racial and/or ethnic groups.
secondary.timeFrame: From the time of ED admission at baseline to femoral puncture for mechanical thrombectomy

secondary.measure: Racial/ethnic differences in mode of emergency department arrival
secondary.description: Comparison of ED arrival modes (walk-in vs emergency medical services) among patients from different racial and/or ethnic groups.

secondary.measure: Racial/ethnic differences in the prevalence of cardiovascular risk factors
secondary.description: Comparison of the prevalence of cerebrovascular risk factors among patients from different racial and/or ethnic groups.

secondary.measure: Racial/ethnic differences in onset symptoms of stroke
secondary.description: Comparison of stroke clinical presentation patterns among patients from different racial and/or ethnic groups.
Comparison of stroke etiologies, classified according to the Trial of Org 10172 in Acute Stroke Treatment (TOAST) criteria, among patients from different racial and/or ethnic groups.
secondary.timeFrame: From enrollment to hospital discharge, up to 90-days from baseline

secondary.measure: Racial/ethnic differences stroke outcome at discharge
secondary.description: Comparison of discharge modified Rankin Scale (mRS) scores among patients from different racial and/or ethnic groups.
secondary.timeFrame: From enrollment to hospital discharge, up to 90-days from baseline

secondary.description: Comparison of 3-month modified Rankin Scale (mRS) scores after acute ischemic stroke among patients from different racial and/or ethnic groups.
secondary.timeFrame: From enrollment to the 3-month follow-up visit
